clusterList.phrase: when our children assess what we and our generation did here in this world as they look backward they will ask one of two questions they'll look back and either they will ask what were you thinking didn't you see the glaciers melting didn't you see the deserts growing and the droughts worsening and the crops drying up didn't you see the sea level rising didn't you see the floods didn't you pay attention to what was going on didn't you care what were you thinking
